title: Let’s Teach Each Other!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Hmm... I got it! Like this, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Correct! Perfect! That should be the last of your homework, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yay! I think I’ve gotten better at English thanks to your excellent teaching!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>One day I hope to have a full conversation in English with you, Shizuku.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I hope so too... I see that nuance can really change between one’s native language and any other language, huh? Do you have trouble communicating with any of us, Mia-san? If you do, then I can-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hey. Calm down, Shizuku!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ah, sorry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Don’t worry about it. You’re all pretty easily understandable, so it’s not like I have any trouble communicating with any of you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’m glad to hear it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>...I’m glad too. Glad that I was able to make friends with people like you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hm?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>It’s nothing. Alright, let’s look at my homework now. The only subject I’m not very good at is classical literature.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Alright, you can count on me for that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
